price: Boca fedhe keessatti walitti si qabe (sanarraa maaltu si gowwoomse)?
arabic: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratin mā shāa rakkabaka
